explains: adj. 上了年纪的；老掉牙的
wordGroup: elderly persons priority scheme 共享颐年优先配屋计划

sentences.en: Many elderly people live in poverty.
sentences.cn: 许多老年人生活于贫困之中。

sentences.en: There was an elderly couple on the terrace.
sentences.cn: 露台上有一对上年纪的老人。

sentences.en: Elderly people easily become socially isolated.
sentences.cn: 上了年纪的人很容易变得与社会隔绝。
